title: Jandy JXi Heater (Rev G & Rev H) — Guided Troubleshooting

enter_serial.text:
Enter the full serial number from the JXi heater.

- Rev G or earlier: starts with B and is 9 characters long (2017 & earlier)
- Rev H or newer: starts with LB and is 18 characters long (2018+)

invalid_serial.text:
❌ Invalid serial number. Try again.
Expected formats:
- Rev G or earlier = B#####
- Rev H or newer = LB#####

rev_g_start.text: Which input voltage is the JXi Rev G configured for?

rev_g_120.text: Measure power at Distribution Board Black and Red. Expect 110–126 VAC.

rev_g_240.text: Measure power at Distribution Board Black and Red. Expect 220–252 VAC.

rev_g_step2.text: Measure transformer output Red → Yellow (Ground). Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_g_transformer_failed.text:
Measured transformer output below 22 VAC with correct input.
Replace transformer (P/N R0456301).

rev_g_replace_fuse.text: PIB fuse open. Replace fuse (P/N R0384900) and verify continuity before continuing.

rev_g_step5.text: Water Pressure Switch: Measure 24 VAC between Purple (4) and Ground, then Gray (5) and Ground. Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_g_pressure_switch_failed.text: Voltage below spec — confirm pump on and filter clean. If pressure > 2 psi and still open, replace Pressure Switch (P/N R0457001).

rev_g_blower_no_power.text: Blower not running. Replace blower assembly (P/N R0591100).

rev_g_igniter.text: After blower starts, does the Hot Surface Igniter glow?

rev_g_igniter_check_input.text:
Measure voltage at Ignition Control K & I terminals during ignition. Expect 105–130 VAC.
If no voltage → verify 24 VAC to board.
If voltage present → check ignitor continuity.

rev_g_igniter_check_continuity.text:
With power off and ignitor cool, check continuity.
✅ Present = OK
❌ Open = Replace Ignitor (P/N R0452300).

rev_g_igniter_no_power.text: No 120 VAC to ignitor — replace ignition control board (P/N R0456900).

rev_g_gas.text:
Measure 24 VAC at Brown (gas valve) → Yellow (Ground). Expect 22–26 VAC.
Does the valve open?

rev_g_gas_valve_mechanical_fail.text: Valve received correct voltage and resistance in spec but did not open. Replace Gas Valve (P/N R0452400) — likely age, corrosion, or debris.

rev_g_flame.text: Do burners ignite and stay lit > 7 s?

rev_g_flame_test.text:
Measure flame-rectification current. Expect ≥ 1.5 µA DC.
If low → clean/replace sensor (P/N R0452502).

rev_g_gas_inlet_pressure_test.text:
Check static inlet gas pressure with heater idle.
Expected values:
- Natural Gas (NG): 5.0–10.5 inWC
- Propane (LP): 11.0–13.0 inWC
Enter measured value:

rev_g_low_gas_supply.text:
Inlet gas pressure below manufacturer specification.
Possible causes: undersized gas line, closed valve, or faulty regulator.
Correct gas supply issue before proceeding.

rev_g_gas_outlet_pressure_test.text:
Check dynamic manifold pressure during ignition.
Expected values:
- Natural Gas (NG): 1.8–2.0 inWC
- Propane (LP): 6.8–7.0 inWC
If within range → OK. If outside range → adjust or replace Gas Valve (P/N R0452400).

rev_h_start.text: Which input voltage is the JXi Rev H configured for?

rev_h_120.text: Measure power at Distribution Board (Black → Red). Expect 110–126 VAC.

rev_h_240.text: Measure at Distribution Board (Black → Red). Expect 220–252 VAC.

rev_h_step2.text: Measure transformer output between Red and Yellow (Ground). Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_h_transformer_failed.text: Transformer output low — replace transformer (P/N R0456301).

rev_h_replace_fuse.text: PIB fuse open. Replace fuse (P/N R0384900) and verify continuity.

rev_h_step4.text: Water Pressure Switch: Measure 24 VAC between Purple (4) → Ground and Gray (5) → Ground. Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_h_pressure_switch_failed.text: Voltage 0 or below spec — verify pump on, filter clean, pressure > 2 psi. Replace Pressure Switch (P/N R0457001).

rev_h_step5.text: High Limits: Check 24 VAC each leg → ground. Expect 22–26 VAC.

rev_h_highlimit_failed.text: Below expected voltage — replace both High Limits (P/N R0592300).

rev_h_blower_no_power.text: Blower not running. Replace blower assembly (P/N R0452200).

rev_h_igniter.text: After blower starts, does the Hot Surface Igniter glow?

rev_h_igniter_check_input.text: Measure voltage at Ignition Control K&I terminals during ignition. Expect 105–130 VAC.

rev_h_igniter_check_continuity.text: Check ignitor continuity (power off). ✅ OK  ❌ Replace (P/N R0452300).

rev_h_igniter_no_power.text: No 120 VAC to ignitor — replace ignition control board (P/N R0451800 validate).

rev_h_gas.text:
Measure 24 VAC at Brown (gas valve) → Yellow (Ground). Expect 22–26 VAC.
Does valve open?

rev_h_gas_valve_mechanical_fail.text: Valve received correct voltage and resistance but did not open. Replace Gas Valve (P/N R0452400) — likely internal failure.

rev_h_flame.text: Do burners ignite and stay lit > 7 s?

rev_h_flame_test.text:
Measure flame rectification current. Expect ≥ 1.5 µA DC.
If low, clean or replace flame sensor (P/N R0452502).

rev_h_gas_inlet_pressure_test.text:
Check static inlet gas pressure with heater idle.
Expected values:
- Natural Gas (NG): 5.0–10.5 inWC
- Propane (LP): 11.0–13.0 inWC
Enter measured value:

rev_h_low_gas_supply.text:
Inlet gas pressure below manufacturer specification.
Possible causes: undersized gas line, closed or partially closed valve, or faulty regulator.
Correct gas supply issue before proceeding.

rev_h_gas_outlet_pressure_test.text:
Check dynamic manifold pressure during ignition.
Expected values:
- Natural Gas (NG): 1.8–2.0 inWC
- Propane (LP): 6.8–7.0 inWC
If within range → OK.
If outside range → adjust or replace Gas Valve (P/N R0452400).

fix_power.text: Correct incoming power, breaker, or wiring to heater before continuing.
